snippet.title: On Your Tail - Official Demo Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2024
snippet.description: On Your Tail is a mystery adventure life simulation puzzle game developed by Memorable Games. Players will embark on a seaside getaway to relax, investigate, and learn how to play the cards right to attain a desired outcome. On Your Tail is launching on Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam) with a demo available now.
